item.title: Maven Release Gitflow
item.description: I like a lot the gitflow way of managing project. When working on maven project, there is few great plugins that helps to get the work done. One of them is maven-release-plugin. Inspired on this gist, I’ve come with a cool way of doing things (let say we want to release a 0.1 version of an artifact) : Prepare the pom.xml.
